News.Title: Atmastco shares surge 17% on defence facility launch
News.Summary: Atmastco Limited's stock jumped 17% after announcing the inauguration of its new defence manufacturing facility on January 24, 2026, strengthening its defence operations despite recent revenue decline.

News.Title: ATMASTCO Partners With Russian Firm for Welding Tech
News.Summary: ATMASTCO Limited announces strategic partnership with Welding Technologies LLC from Russia to develop specialized welding technology in India over a 15-year period.

News.Title: Atmastco Begins Trial Production at Defence Subsidiary's New Bhilai Factory
News.Summary: Atmastco has commenced trial production at its subsidiary Atmastco Defence's new manufacturing facility in Bhilai. The company has a market capitalization of Rs 560 crore.

News.Title: Atmastco Secures ₹36.97 Crore Purchase Orders from L&T-MHI Power Boilers
News.Summary: Atmastco has received purchase orders worth ₹36.97 crores from L&T-MHI Power Boilers for fabrication materials. The execution will be based on order terms. The company currently has a market capitalization of ₹500 crores.

News.Title: Atmastco Defence Systems Manufacturing Unit Nears Completion
News.Summary: Atmastco has announced that its Defence Systems Manufacturing Unit is approaching completion. The company expects to begin trial production at this new facility by April 2025, marking a significant milestone in its expansion into the defense sector.
